item.description:
This conference will feature Israeli cleantech companies that offer cutting-edge technologies in areas such as water conservation, sewage treatment and alternative energy. It will include keynote speakers, panel discussions, and company presentations followed by one-on-one meetings with potential investors.

The conference is organized by the Government of Israel, New England-Israel Business Council, and Brandeis Universityâ€™s International Business School, in collaboration with the Boston Israel Cleantech Alliance. Sponsors include Atlas Venture, North Bridge Venture Partners, and Greenberg Traurig.

One-on-one meetings between investors and entrepreneurs will take place during the day. A public event in the evening will feature a keynote address by Governor Deval Patrick and time for networking.

Please note, to attend the conference you must also register through the NEIBC web site: http://www.neibc.com/...
item.name: Israel Cleantech Investor Conference
